entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MauiAsset are not be copied during the Unpackaged publish #17260
  • Issues with the emulator #17259
  • Veeeery poor performance in ScrollView #17257
  • iOS: cannot set the PlatformView.BarTintColor for the SearchBar #17254
  • DeviceInfo.Current.VersionString crash android apk #17253
  • .net8 borders ItemTemplate doesn't show if it includes a border (Using PanCardView) #17252
    .NET 8 GA
  • I can't rum my program #17249
  • WinUI3 Maui Essentials Share Dialog results in a crash on Windows 10 21H2 (Build19044.3086) #17247
  • .Net C# Maui 6 Release Mode Crash "ZIndex" #17245

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor release version fine, published version fails #17116
  • Maui on windows emulator dont do Swipe like it do on Android emulator #17151
  • [MAUI] Recipe App build failed with error: One or more duplicate file names were detected #17213
  • Custom color for selected bottom tabbar in Shell not working. #16551
    Under Consideration
  • CollectionView with ItemTemplate containing Images with UriImageSource throws TaskCanceledException when scrolling #10632
    Backlog
  • Error compiling 8.0 preview 1 #13897
  • Nested CollectionViews aren't rendered correctly in iOS and MacCatalyst #16966
  • Using central package management causes build breaking NU1009 with MAUI projects #12953
    .NET 8 GA
  • The covered element can still get focus. #17251
  • App crashes when setting the `Style` property using the VisualStateManager within an implicit Style resource #17201
    Backlog
  • TypeConverterAttribute bug with custom type converter #17203
    Backlog
  • Image in CollectionView renders white or black occasionally on Android #17011
  • Slower webview inside MAUI #17106
  • Hot reload file save issue in .NET MAUI #17038

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix collection default spacing #17261
    i/regression
  • Revert "Revert Factory Registration to fix ListView regression (#17084)" #17258
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] improve performance of ActivityExtensions.GetWindowFrame #17256
  • [build] Update main with latest changes for internal builds #17255
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Enable Mac Catalyst Core Device Tests in CI #17232
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve ToolbarExtensions.UpdateIconColor performance #17241
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [msbuild] fix NuGet Central Package Management (CPM) #17235
    area/single project ☝️, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove null forgiveness operator and fix NRE from `PlatformView` in disconnect #17248
  • Copy Windows assets to the output folder for Unpackaged #17238
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Update with internal flow #17216
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17244
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
    area/architecture, Under Consideration
  • Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048
    area/architecture, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix single taps #16561
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Controls Device Tests in CI #17229
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [C] Port the specificity concept to Bindings #17215
    Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
